p: Beginning with our, the highest-ranking keyword for Corpus 1, we found that its most frequently occurring collocate, or neighboring word, is, by a long way, customers (the phrase our customers occurs 1,361 times in Corpus 1; the single word customers occurs 4,052 times), followed by (our) business (n = 509), (our) own (n = 462) and (our) stores (n = 449). Given the high frequency of customers and our customers, we decided to take customers as a starting point for closer investigation.
